name: Cubey´s Adventure
description:
The dice rule over the desks. Their versatile nature is a threat to all other inhabitants of the gameboard. Humans prefer them, humans even love them. Envy spreads among meeples, cards and chess pieces. A dark plan has been forged in the depths of the world.  A plan, evil and rotten in its core, will shake the desks. Savage times require a single heroic die to reunite the legendary "Circle of the Seven".

Accompany little Cubey on its mission and defeat waves of cruel enemies. They want to stop you, but you have the power of courage!
